Class TrainingDocuments

extends Object
    Utility functions for TrainingDocuments.

    • Method Detail

      • fromMetaData

        public static TrainingDocument fromMetaData(String uri,
                            String title,
                            boolean isAnnotated)
        Create a new TrainingDocument without fetching the actual CDocument.
        This creates a new TrainingDocument that contains the meta data (uri and title) of a CDocument, but not a reference to the CDocument itself. This is used by the ITagService to return Metadata of training documents without actually fetching the contents of the documents.
        Parameters:
        uri - The CDocument's URI.
        title - The CDocument's title.
        isAnnotated - True if the CDocument is annotated with labels, false if not.
        Returns:
        The newly created TrainingDocument. The content property of the document is null.

      • fromDocument

        public static TrainingDocument fromDocument(CDocument document,
                            boolean isAnnotated)
        Create a new TrainingDocument for a given CDocument. The TrainingDocument's URI and title will be set using the respective values from the CDocument.
        Parameters:
        document - the CDocument to wrap.
        isAnnotated - True if the CDocument is annotated with labels, false if not.
        Returns:
        The newly created TrainingDocument.

      • fromDocuments

        public static List<TrainingDocument> fromDocuments(Collection<CDocument> documents,
                                   boolean areAnnotated)
        Create a new list of TrainingDocuments for a given list of CDocuments. The TrainingDocument's URIs and titles will be set from the respective values of the corresponding CDocuments.
        Parameters:
        documents - the CDocuments to wrap.
        areAnnotated - True if the CDocuments are annotated with labels, false if they are not.
        Returns:
        The newly created TrainingDocument.

      • getUris

        public static List<String> getUris(Collection<TrainingDocument> trainingDocuments)
        Retrieve all URIs of a list of TrainingDocuments.
        Parameters:
        trainingDocuments - The TrainingDocuments to retrieve the URLs of.
        Returns:
        A list of URLs in the same order as the given list of TrainingDocuments.

      • getIDs

        public static List<Long> getIDs(Collection<TrainingDocument> trainingDocuments)
        Retrieve all IDs of a list of TrainingDocuments.
        Parameters:
        trainingDocuments - The TrainingDocuments to retrieve the IDs of.
        Returns:
        A list of IDs in the same order as the given list of TrainingDocuments.

      • getCDocuments

        public static List<CDocument> getCDocuments(Collection<TrainingDocument> trainingDocuments)
        Retrieve all loaded CDocuments of a list of TrainingDocuments.
        Parameters:
        trainingDocuments - The TrainingDocuments to retrieve the CDocuments of.
        Returns:
        A list of CDocumenty in the same order as the given list of TrainingDocuments. The list may contain nulls.
